name: Gretel's Grub! (One Hour Game Jam 81)
description:
Gretel is looking for food in the forest. Collect berries to survive!

This is a tiny retro arcade game and made in a hour using Pico-8, for the 81st One Hour Game Jam. If you're interested in how it works, the source code is available.

The theme for this One Hour Game Jam was 'survival'.

Instructions

  • Move yourself around with the arrow keys.
  • Collect berries to keep your health up.
  • Survive for as long as you can and try to beat your best time!
